title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 111.12 - Seed testing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 111.12 - Seed testing

State Regulations

Analysis and tests of samples of seed, and definitions of
analytic terms shall be in accordance with the rules of the Association of

Official Seed Analysts, when these are established. In the interim, rules of
the International Seed Testing Association will be followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
111.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
